roleset.name: to treat with sulfur
roleset.note: SULFURIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'sulfurize' based on internet usage examples, expansion via VerbNet. VN 45.4. Comparison with 'carbonize.' (from sulfurize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Descriptive usage
example.text: Unlike products from the wax ester jojoba oil, the sulfurized vegetable triglycerides alone had physical properties generally undesirable for lubricant additives
